name: Hardest So-So Soccer 2002 Trivia Quiz | Football Players | 15 Questions

questions.text: For what club & country did Josep Guardiola play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Brescia & Spain.

	Guardiola stareted his career at Barcelona. Later on he moved to Brescia.

questions.text: What club & country did Mario Jardel play for in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Sporting Lisbon & Brazil.

	Jardel's first European club was Porto.

questions.text: For what club & country did Frank Lampard play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Chelsea & England.

	Lampard made his debut with Chelsea on 19-8-01 against Newcastle.

questions.text: For what club & country did Philippe Christanval play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Barcelona & France.

	Christanval has 1 international cap for France.

questions.text: What club & country did Nicolas Anelka play for in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Liverpool & France.

	Anelka made his name with Arsenal.

questions.text: For what club & country did Hatem Trabelsi play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Ajax & Tunisia.

	He wears number 6 at Ajax.

questions.text: For what club & country did Zlatan Ibrahimovic play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Ajax & Sweden.

	Ibrahimvic was born on 3-10-81.

questions.text: What club & country did Petri Pasanen play for in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Ajax & Finland.

	Pasanen made his debut for Ajax against AZ.

questions.text: For what club & country did Gabor Kiràly play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Hertha Berlin & Hungary.

	He's a GK.

questions.text: For what club & country did Gaizka Mendieta play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Lazio & Spain.

	Mendieta moved to Barcelona for the 2002-03 season.

questions.text: For what club & country did Juan Roman Riquelme play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Boca Juniors & Argentina.

	He also joined Barcelona for the 2002-03 season.

questions.text: What club & country did Fernando Morientes play for in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Real Madrid & Spain.

	Morientes was born in Sonseca, Spain.

questions.text: For what club and country did Romario play for in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Vasco & Brazil.

	Romario played in three European teams: Barcelona, PSV, and Valencia.

questions.text: For what club & country did Bart Goor play in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Hertha Berlin & Belgium.

	Goor moved to Hertha from Anderlecht. He also scored the first goal of Euro 2000.

questions.text: What club & country did Frankie Hejduk play for in the 2001-02 season?
questions.explanation:
Bayer Leverkusen & USA.

	I first heard of Hejduk during the '98 World Cup.
